circumstances: The approach to Millville Airport was completed at a too high speed and with the flaps retracted. After touchdown, the pilot completed a heavy braking procedure. Control was lost and the airplane veered off runway and came to rest in flames in a grassy area. All three occupants were uninjured while the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause: The pilot misjudged distance, speed and altitude and failed to extend the landing flaps. Directional control lost after landing.
